learning.unsupervised

Class ClusterConfigurationCleaner

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.unsupervised.ClusterConfigurationCleaner

  • public class ClusterConfigurationCleaner
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the functionality for cleaning the cluster configuration of empty cluster in the array.

    • Method Detail

      • removeEmptyClusters

        public void removeEmptyClusters()
        Will re-index the associations array to new values, removing the "holes" in the cluster index sequence.

      • getNewNumberOfClusters

        public int getNewNumberOfClusters()
        Returns:
        The number of clusters in the cleaned association array.

      • getNewAssociationArray

        public int[] getNewAssociationArray()
        Returns:
        The cleaned and re-indexed cluster associations array.

      • getNewConfiguration

        public Cluster[] getNewConfiguration()
        Returns:

        Returns:
